mapper.select: select * from ac_teacher where ac_teacher_name like '%${value}%'
select a.* from ac_teacher a,ac_teacher_course b where b.ac_teacher_course_courseId = '${value}' AND a.ac_teacher_id=b.ac_teacher_course_teacherId
mapper.insert: insert into ac_teacher (ac_teacher_id, ac_teacher_userId, ac_teacher_phoneNumber, ac_teacher_password, ac_teacher_name, ac_teacher_realId, ac_teacher_bkPhoneNumber, ac_teacher_status, ac_teacher_fromConpany, ac_teacher_proveFile, ac_teacher_proveFileChecked) values (#{acTeacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acTeacherUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acTeacherPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherRealid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherBkphonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acTeacherFromconpany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherProvefile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acTeacherProvefilechecked,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
